title: Minister clarifies NO kerosene at LIOC
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekara said that IOC does NOT sell Kerosene which makes the biggest loss.
“They sell other premium products which have a higher markup,” tweeted the Minister.
The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) supplies to CEB, CTB, CGR and other Government institutes which owe money to the CPC and the staff numbers are staggering too, he said.
Rich Countries Putting Children Around The World At Risk: UN
